name: R5-Provenance-R4-Provenance
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Provenance into FHIR R4

element.display: Who, What, When for a set of resources

target.display: Who, What, When for a set of resources
target.comment: R5 `Provenance` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance`
R5 `Provenance.activity` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Provenance.activity` - activity changed the binding strength from Example to Extensible
R5 `Provenance.agent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.agent`

R5 `Provenance.agent.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.agent.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Provenance.agent.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.agent.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.agent.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.agent.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Provenance.agent.onBehalfOf` - onBehalfOf has change due to type change: R5 `onBehalfOf` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `onBehalfOf`
R5 `Provenance.agent.role` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.agent.role`
R5 `Provenance.agent.type` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Provenance.agent.type` - type changed the binding strength from Example to Extensible

element.display: The agent that participated in the event

target.comment: R5 `Provenance.agent.who` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.agent.who` - who has change due to type change: R5 `who` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `who`

element.display: Workflow authorization within which this event occurred

target.comment: R5 `Provenance.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.contained`

element.display: Encounter within which this event occurred or which the event is tightly associated
An entity used in this activity

target.display: An entity used in this activity
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.entity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.entity`

element.display: Entity is attributed to this agent

target.display: Entity is attributed to this agent
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.entity.agent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.entity.agent`

R5 `Provenance.entity.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.entity.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Provenance.entity.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.entity.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.entity.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.entity.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Provenance.entity.role` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.entity.role` - role has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/provenance-entity-role|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/provenance-entity-role|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Provenance.entity.what` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.entity.what`

R5 `Provenance.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Provenance.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.implicitRules`
R5 `Provenance.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Provenance.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Where the activity occurred, if relevant

target.display: Where the activity occurred, if relevant
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.location` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.location`
R5 `Provenance.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.meta`

R5 `Provenance.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Provenance.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Provenance.occurred[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.occurred[x]`

element.display: The patient is the subject of the data created/updated (.target) by the activity
Policy or plan the activity was defined by

target.display: Policy or plan the activity was defined by
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.policy` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.policy`

element.display: When the activity was recorded / updated

target.display: When the activity was recorded / updated
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.recorded` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Provenance.recorded` - recorded made the element mandatory; recorded increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1
R5 `Provenance.signature` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Provenance.signature` - signature has change due to type change: R5 `signature` `Signature` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `signature`
R5 `Provenance.target` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.target`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Provenance.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Provenance.text`
